akn:section.akn:heading: Prohibition against implementation of regulatory authority by Federal agencies through partnerships

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 8213. Prohibition against implementation of regulatory authority by Federal agencies through partnerships Any Partnership designated under this chapter—(1) shall be for the sole purpose of promoting fish conservation; and
(2) shall not be used to implement any regulatory authority of any Federal agency.
(Pub. L. 116–188, title II, § 213, Oct. 30, 2020, 134 Stat. 938.)
(1) shall be for the sole purpose of promoting fish conservation; and
(2) shall not be used to implement any regulatory authority of any Federal agency.
